intro.description: This tutorial informs you how to run your newly created MapReduce Project in one of two fashions: locally as a Java Application, or on a Hadoop Server.

item.title: Run as Java Application
item.description: To run your MapReduce application locally, right-click on your Driver class in the Package Explorer and select Run as / Java Application.

item.title: Run on Hadoop Server
item.description: To run your MapReduce application on a Hadoop server, right-click on your Driver class in the Package Explorer and select Run as / Run on Hadoop.
